aboutGame.title: What if you could play CS:GO, remade, in Source 2 as a top down shooter?
aboutGame.descr: Engage in an incredibly realistic brand of terrorist warfare in this wildly popular team-based game. Ally with teammates to complete strategic missions. Take out enemy sites. Rescue hostages. Your role affects your team's success. Your team's success affects your role.

1.a: First things first, you're going to have to install the Dota 2 game client. To do so, make sure you search for the base game on Steam, and then install it as usual. Once you've installed Dota 2, launch Dota 2, go to the Arcade page, search for PolyStrike, and then add the mode to your installation.

2.a: Yes, PolyStrike supports Source 2, as it's custom game in Dota 2 Client

3.q: 3. What is the best way to follow news?

auth.title: Battle Pass
auth.thanks: You already have a Battle Pass! Thank you for being with us!

pay.text.line1: To get the Battle Pass, you need to become a Patron.
pay.text.line2: Please click on the button to proceed to payment:

players.title: Top 100 Users By Matches Played
players.notes: Data is updated once an hour!
players.bp.tooltip: Players in the TOP-10 get a free Battle Pass for 1 week or while they are in the top-10.
